sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-checkbox-group v-model="internalAnswer">
    <a-checkbox v-for="(option, index) in question.content.options" :key="index" :value="index">
      {{ option }}
    </a-checkbox>
  </a-checkbox-group>
</template>

<script>
import { ref, watch } from "vue";

export default {
  name: "MultipleChoice",
  props: {
    question: Object,
    modelValue: Array,
  },
  setup(props, {emit}) {
    const internalAnswer = ref(props.modelValue);

    watch(internalAnswer, (newValue) => {
      emit("update:modelValue", newValue);
    });

    return {
      internalAnswer,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 你的样式 */
</style>
